message.title: You have received a message from {{sender.lastname}} {{sender.firstname}}

tandemClosureNotice.title: A tandem will be finished
tandemClosureNotice.body: We regret to inform you that the {{university.name}} service will close the {{university.closeDate}} terminating sessions between tandems.

tandemPaused.title: A tandem has been paused
tandemPaused.body: We regret to inform you that one of your tandems has been put on pause.

tandemUnpaused.title: A tandem was released from the break
tandemUnpaused.body: We're happy to announce that one of your tandems is no longer on break.

activityPublished.title: An activity has been published
activityPublished.body: We're happy to announce that the activity {{activity.title}} has been published.

activityRejected.title: An activity has been rejected
activityRejected.body: We regret to inform you that the activity {{activity.title}} has been rejected.
